sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {InfoSec, InfoRow, InfoColumn, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, ImgWrapper, Img} from './InfoSection.elements' import { Container, Button } from '../../globalStyles' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const InfoSection = ({ primary, lightBg, topLine, lightTopLine, lightText, lightTextDesc, headline, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, imgStart, start }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection;
